1 tablespoon unsalted butter,2/3 cup half and half,2 large eggs,2 teaspoons white sugar,1 teaspoon vanilla extract,1/8 teaspoon salt,3 cups cinnamon raisin bread,2 tablespoons all-purpose flour,2 tablespoons light brown sugar,1/8 teaspoon ground cinnamon,2 tablespoons unsalted butter,1/8 teaspoon salt,1/2 cup maple syrup, or to taste (optional),,
